select b.promotion_deduction, b.commission,b.net_income, b.stage,buyer.brand_name customer,buyer.avator customerAvatar,d.consumer_id customerUserId, d.cell_title service,b.amount,b.id billId,b.voucher,b.create_at added from bill b inner join order_details d on b.order_id = d.id inner join brand buyer on buyer.customer_id=d.consumer_id
1=1 and b.mark = #{dto.code} and d.brand_id = #{brand_id}
AND (locate(#{dto.q}, d.cell_title)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, b.stage)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, buyer.brand_name)>0)
order by b.create_at desc
